references.paper_title: Loss of plasticity in continual deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of loss of plasticity in continual reinforcement learning, a key challenge addressed by the present work.

references.paper_title: A definition of continual reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper provides a formal definition of continual reinforcement learning, the setting within which the current work's contributions are situated.
This paper introduces the MECHANIC algorithm, which is closely related to the proposed TRAC algorithm and provides insights into the design choices.

references.paper_title: Discounted adaptive online learning: Towards better regularization
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical framework for online convex optimization in non-stationary settings, which is the foundation for the TRAC optimizer's design.

references.paper_title: Deep reinforcement learning with plasticity injection
references.reason: This paper proposes the technique of plasticity injection to mitigate the loss of plasticity, a method compared to the proposed TRAC algorithm.
